subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Since Darryl Sutter took over as coach on Dec. 20, Los Angeles has made the playoffs as the West’s No. 8 seed and dispatched the top two seeds, and they’re now a win away from the Stanley Cup finals.
snippet: Since Darryl Sutter took over as coach on Dec. 20, Los Angeles has made the playoffs as the West’s No. 8 seed and dispatched the top two seeds, and they’re now a win away from the Stanley Cup finals.
